content:
Any final comments or objections before merging https://github.com/bytecodealliance/cranelift/pull/1359 ? It seems like a useful thing to do. If by Tuesday of next week (Feb 22nd) there are no blocking issues, my current disposition would be to merge this.

Crate directory reorganization + update fuzzing-related deps by fitzgen 路 Pull Request #1359 路 bytecodealliance/cranelift
Crate directory reorg fixes #956 Second and third commits update to new fuzzer crates and also stop using a git dependency for binaryen since it's no longer necessary.
Yup, LGTM; we'll have to rebase the arm64 backend branch that that's totally do-able and I don't want to hold up anything.
